name: Butterflies (Laromlab)
description:
Butterflies is a short but sweet 2d platformer I made primarily to get used to the new game engine I was using. 

You play as a young girl who has missed the bus and is late for school. Lucky for her, she meets a strange butterfly who offers to help the girl, saying they know a shortcut.

Thus, the adventure begins!

Enjoy!

This game has a fair few bugs and other things that I'll need to clean up a little. I just wanted to learn about building games as well as making them. If you notice anything be sure to let me know in the comments. (God I sound like a YouTuber)
